document_data.caption: Vrondiss, Rage of Ancients
document_data.name: Vrondiss
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/The Legends of Adventures in the Forgotten Realms}}{{Cite MTG|AFC|004|Vrondiss, Rage of Ancients|[[Svetlin Velinov]]}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Vrondiss''' was a [[barbarian]] and adventurer that sought to gain great wealth and glorious exploits across the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Abilities: When Vrondiss dove into battle, he entered into a berserker frenzy that bolstered his physical strength and made him resilient to oncoming harm.
document_data.Activities: As a barbarian that traveled the [[Path of the Ancestral Guardian]], Vrondiss drew upon the wisdom and power bestowed upon him by his draconic ancestors.
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of an adventuring company that included the [[elf|elven]] [[paladin]] [[Galea]], the [[tiefling]] [[warlock]] [[Prosper]], and the [[Red Wizard]] [[necromancer]] [[Sefris]].
